languages.text: "Еще раз посмеешь мне перечить — я исполню твое пожелание, и уборкой ты будешь заниматься уже в виде безмозглого чучела на аккумуляторе!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Хватит спорит и веди себя потише пока нас не услышали не превратили в сервиторов!

languages.text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"
languages.original_text: "Еще раз посмеешь мне перечить — я исполню твое пожелание, и уборкой ты будешь заниматься уже в виде безмозглого чучела на аккумуляторе!"

traits.locale_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you this wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"
"You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you this wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"
"You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"
"You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"
"You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

languages.text: “你再敢这么和我顶嘴，我就满足你的愿望，把你变成没有脑子、用电池供电的铁皮罐子！”
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: “你再敢这么和我顶嘴，我就满足你的愿望，把你变成没有脑子、用电池供电的铁皮罐子！”

languages.text: «Como me repliques una sola vez más vas a salirte con la tuya. ¡Acabarás limpiando convertido en un montón de hojalata con batería!».
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: «Como me repliques una sola vez más vas a salirte con la tuya. ¡Acabarás limpiando convertido en un montón de hojalata con batería!».

languages.text: 「もう一度言い返してみろ…前の願いを叶えてやる。脳みそのない、電池で動くブリキの塊として掃除することになるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: 「もう一度言い返してみろ…前の願いを叶えてやる。脳みそのない、電池で動くブリキの塊として掃除することになるぞ！」

languages.text: "Noch so eine Antwort – und Euer Wunsch geht in Erfüllung. Ihr werden Eure Putzarbeit als hirnlose, batteriebetriebene Blechbüchse verrichten!"
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: "Noch so eine Antwort – und Euer Wunsch geht in Erfüllung. Ihr werden Eure Putzarbeit als hirnlose, batteriebetriebene Blechbüchse verrichten!"

languages.text: « Réponds-moi encore une fois sur ce ton et j'exaucerai ton vœu. Que dirais-tu de finir en boîte de conserve sans cervelle alimentée par une batterie ? »
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: « Réponds-moi encore une fois sur ce ton et j'exaucerai ton vœu. Que dirais-tu de finir en boîte de conserve sans cervelle alimentée par une batterie ? »

languages.text: "Hele bana bir kere daha cevap ver, o zaman bu arzunu yerine getireceğim. Beyinsiz, pille çalışan bir konserve kutusu olarak temizlik yapacaksın!"
languages.original_text: "You talk back to me one more time — and I'll grant you your wish. You'll be cleaning up as a brainless, battery-powered tin can!"

traits.locale_text: "Hele bana bir kere daha itiraz et, o zaman senin bu arzunu hemen yerine getiririm. Beyinsiz, pille çalışan bir konserve kutusu olarak temizlik yaparsın!"
